content:
You've been enjoying some of the latest releases on Amazon Prime Video! "Wonder Woman 1984" and "Soul" are both great choices for a fun family movie night.

Amazon Prime Video has been expanding its offerings, and it's wonderful that you're taking advantage of the new releases available for rent. It's a great way to stay current with the latest movies without having to go to the cinema.

"Wonder Woman 1984" is an action-packed adventure that explores the iconic superhero's journey in the 1980s. The film's nostalgic value, combined with Gal Gadot's impressive performance, makes it a thrilling watch.

"Soul", on the other hand, is a beautifully animated film that delves into the world of jazz and the meaning of life. The movie's stunning visuals, paired with its thought-provoking themes, make it a great choice for families to enjoy together.

It's lovely that you got to share these movie experiences with your family over the holidays. There's something special about watching movies together and sharing in the excitement and emotions they evoke.

Have you explored Amazon Prime Video's original content as well? They have some fantastic original series and movies, like "The Grand Tour", "The Marvelous Mrs. Maisel", and "Borat Subsequent Moviefilm", to name a few.

Let me know if you need any more recommendations or have any other questions!
